description: '''The Eighties Matchbox B-Line Disaster''' (often referred to as '''Eighties Matchbox''', '''80s Matchbox''', '''TEMBD''', '''TEMBLD''' or shortened to just '''Eighties''' or '''80s''') were an English rock band from [[Brighton]], formed in 1999. They released three albums, ''[[Horse of the Dog|Hörse of the Dög]]'' (2002), ''[[The Royal Society (album)|The Royal Society]]'' (2004) and ''[[Blood and Fire (album)|Blood and Fire]]'' (2010).
